item.title: Use Ansible Synchronize Module to Sync Files Include Templates
item.description: Inspired by this post, I finally find the way to sync a directory include template files to remote. Put you files in {{ role_path }}/files/, if you need to put in another directory, please replace all the role_path variable. - name:"Create temporary directory"local_action:tempfile state=directoryregister:temp_file_path- name:"Find j2 files"local_action:module:findpaths:"{{ role_path }}/files/"patterns:"*.j2"file_type:fileuse_regex:norecurse:yesregister:files_j2- name:"Find normal files"local_action:module:findpaths:"{{ role_path }}/files/"excludes:"*.
